messages.message:
@mfichman I tried all the above steps but while port forwarding it gives me the following error:
```Fatal: invalid destination port in forward rule "80:dev:80": no port found in workloads.```
I am using this to port forward:
```sudo sh -c "CRAFTING_SANDBOX_SERVER_URL=https://instabase.sandboxes.site/  cs pf -L 80:dev:80 -L 8081:dev:8081 -W prakhar-ppy/dev"```
Please help. I have been blocked for the whole day due to this. :blob_sad:
Make sure you update your sandbox - resync it with the template. Send me a link to your sandbox and I can take a look.
I tried the `Refresh base image` but even that did not work for me
I'll do it now, but I think that is the problem.
Oops, I was thinking by resync you mean rebuild workspace

By the way, you can also use:

```cs ssh -- -L80:localhost:80 -N ```
Instead of `cs pf`.
3rd option: Use the (new) public URL for your sandbox instead of tunneling: https://ppy-server-nginx--prakhar-ppy-instabase.instabase.site.sandboxes.run/
Yeah, just give me a min. I'll get the service and check.

Thanks @mfichman. Its working at the url but the port forward still fails.
```bind [::1]:80: Permission denied
channel_setup_fwd_listener_tcpip: cannot listen to port: 80
Could not request local forwarding.```
